scripts.dist: browserify src/view/browser.js --s createWebshell -p licensify -o dist/webshell.js -t  [ babelify --presets [ es2015-script ] ]
scripts.dist:watch: watchify src/view/browser.js --s createWebshell -p licensify -o dist/webshell.js -t  [ babelify --presets [ es2015-script ] ]
scripts.dist:release: npm run dist && cp dist/webshell.js dist/webshell-$(md5sum dist/webshell.js | cut -c 1-10).js
